Sentece: Administration of a single pazopanib 400 mg crushed tablet increased the area under the curve from 0 to 72 h (AUC((0-72)); 46%) and maximum observed plasma concentration (C(max); ~2-fold), and decreased time to achieve maximum plasma concentration (T(max); ~2 h), indicating increased rate and extent of oral absorption relative to whole-tablet administration.
